dialogues.name: Teresa
dialogues.dialogueText: Hey Maria, You look sad! What happened!

dialogues.name: Maria
dialogues.dialogueText: I dont want to go to school.

dialogues.name: Maria
dialogues.dialogueText: Some of the students make fun of me and from this morning..

dialogues.name: Maria
dialogues.dialogueText: I cannot log in to my email. It says wrong password everytime!

dialogues.name: Teresa
dialogues.dialogueText: Did you try to reset your password?

dialogues.name: Maria
dialogues.dialogueText: Yes but still it asks for old password!!

dialogues.name: Teresa
dialogues.dialogueText: I see your password is written in the post-it!

dialogues.name: Maria
dialogues.dialogueText: Yes, I thought it would be easy to remember password to have it on post-it!

dialogues.name: Teresa
dialogues.dialogueText: Others could see it too, some one may have stolen your password and changed it!

dialogues.name: Teresa
dialogues.dialogueText: Sadly, your email account is hacked as someone may have cracked your password.

dialogues.name: Teresa
dialogues.dialogueText: Do not worry, let me help you for what you need to do the next!
